item.title: ‘1923’ Costume Designer Janie Bryant On What She’s Wearing to the Emmys, Her Red Carpet Wardrobe Hacks and More
item.description: The designer also reveals her favorite Western-inspired fashion pieces she discovered from ‘Yellowstone’ star Kelly Reilly.

item.title: Martin Scorsese, Ron Howard Nominated for First Emmys for Acting for ‘The Studio’
item.description: Bryan Cranston, Anthony Mackie and Dave Franco also received guest acting nominations for the Apple TV+ show.

item.title: Nominees in Two Emmys Categories Will Be Announced Ahead of Official TV Academy Livestream
item.description: Best reality competition series and best talk series will be revealed about four hours earlier than the other categories.
